item.description:
I recently heard there was a dead body in the river in this area...
And the old saying goes, if there is one there are a lot more..
or was that about something else ??????
Anyway..

I want this Meetup.com group to be on the news for finding something in the river.

Ok maybe a quick clip of kayakers having fun..maybe that will help to just plain get you off your couch butts and get that kayak butt on the water.. An Adventure...

Ok here are the options:
(1) Start from the River Street and rte 75 put in..
its a nice 9 mile trip to the windsor boat launch.

(2) Start from the BARTS put in on Pleasant st and rte 159..
I hope it wasnt BARTS food that poisoned the body..i was going to stop there for a snack before continuing down to the boat launch. 3.6 mile trip

(3) river street to barts...5 miles

Depending on wether the dam is releasing water, the river street part of the river is usually low and not well passible, with the release on..there is some whitewater..NO FIBERGLASS kayaks for that start location.
From BARTS on down..fiberglass is fine..its flatwater....

Meet at The River Street location to assess the situation, drive to BARTS if necessary..

Getting there:
From Hartford or from the north,
take 91 to exit #38 this is rte 75 go north...(towards poquanock and bradley apt.)
from the exit off of 91..... River Street is about 2 miles on the right, you will cross the river by bridge, take the right on to River st..go less than a quarter mile and on the right is a driveway/parking lot to the put in area.
I have the Blue Toyota Avalon with a few yaks on a trailer..

For Mapquest or GPS directions , use 76 River street, Windsor, ct
that will get you close enough.

Heavy Rain cancells this event,
Light rain back up plan... meet at River street lot ..then We can go to BARTS and see if they serve something that killed the person or cook our own stuff on the tables by the Put In behind Barts......
NO WINE....
well maybe....

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: BODY Hunting Expidition by Kayak on the Farmington River
